translation.en: [speaking English] She says it is the work... of the barbarian devil king.
translation.es: Dice que es obradel rey diablo bárbaro.

translation.en: [man speaking English] Her village was loyal to the rebel Song dynasty.
translation.es: Su aldea era leala la dinastía Song rebelde.

translation.en: If one does not submit to the rule of the Khan...
translation.es: Si uno no se sometea la autoridad del Kan,

translation.en: this is what happens.
[Maffeo] Gerege!
[Kublai speaking English] The Latins.
Yes, I remember.
But where are the Christian priests you were to bring, hmm?
translation.es: ¿Dónde están los sacerdotes cristianosque debían traer?

translation.en: [Niccolò] Lord Kublai... please accept our remorse.
Our priests could not bear the rigors of the journey.
translation.es: Nuestros sacerdotes no soportaronlos rigores de la travesía.

translation.en: But we did bring you holy oil from--
translation.es: Pero sí le trajimos aceite santo de--

translation.en: Your men of God retreat, but this boy advances.
translation.es: Sus hombres de Dios retroceden,pero este muchacho avanza.

translation.en: It says very little for your savior. Hmm?
translation.es: Eso habla muy mal de su salvador.

translation.en: Loyalty... of a mortal son to a mortal father, Great Khan.
translation.es: Es la lealtad de un hijo mortala su padre mortal, Gran Kan.

translation.en: Holy oil
from the pontiff who wishes to spread
Christianity throughout my lands.
Is this not the same Pope who has called me "the spawn of Satan"?
translation.es: ¿No es el mismo Papaque me ha llamado "engendro de Satán"?

translation.en: I will say this and you will listen.
translation.es: Les diré algo y quiero que lo escuchen.

translation.en: Christianity is welcome in my kingdom.
translation.es: El cristianismo es bienvenido en mi reino.

translation.en: As is Buddhism...
Judaism... Islam...
and the Eternal Blue Sky of my grandfather, Genghis Khan,
translation.es: y el Eterno Cielo Azul de mi abuelo,Gengis Kan,

translation.en: descended from a wolf.
So, tell your Pope that he himself must bow before me...
translation.es: Así que díganle a su Papaque él en persona debe inclinarse ante mí

translation.en: and pledge his fealty to me.
As for you merchants...
you crossed ocean and mountain...
the great Takla Makan Desert.
One not many men survive.
translation.es: Uno que no muchos hombres sobreviven.

translation.en: Describe for me my desert, hmm?
It is a...
most barren region, Sire.
No water. No life, Lord Khan.
translation.es: No hay agua. No hay vida, Señor Kan.

translation.en: -Not even a bird. -Not even a bird.
translation.es: -Ni siquiera un ave.-Ni siquiera un ave.

translation.en: It is, Great Khan... a sea of death.
translation.es: Es un mar de muerte, Gran Kan.

translation.en: Yet very much alive.
translation.es: Y aun así, está lleno de vida.

translation.en: At night you hear it.
The shifting sands, they... sing.
translation.es: El cantar de las dunas que se desplazan.

translation.en: Humble apologies, Sire. -He does not yet know the rules of the-- -[Kublai grunts]
translation.es: Mis más humildes disculpas, Majestad.Él desconoce aún las normas del--

translation.en: Continue.
Voices like... spirits...
trying to lure you off course.
translation.es: que procuran desviarlo de su rumbo.

translation.en: This is why men die out there.
translation.es: Por eso mueren allí los hombres.

translation.en: The Uighurs called it...
You learned the tongue of the Uighurs?
Three years was not long enough to learn it all.
translation.es: Tres años no fueron suficientespara aprenderla bien.

translation.en: [speaking English] Of all the lands a traveler passes through...
translation.es: De todas las tierrasque recorre el viajero,

translation.en: which province contains...
in your eye, the most beautiful women of all?
translation.es: en tu opinión,las mujeres más bellas?

translation.en: I find that all women, no matter from which land...
translation.es: Yo creo que,no importa su tierra natal,

translation.en: they are all beautiful in their own unique manner.
translation.es: todas las mujeres son bellasde una manera única y especial.

translation.en: In Italy, we have a saying...
[speaking English] "The true sweetness of wine...
is one flavor."
You have a clever mind.
For a Latin.
I made one request. It was not for oil.
translation.es: Hice un pedido.Y no era aceite.

translation.en: It was for priests. With this, you failed.
Take your leave.
Go, Latins.
You're banished forever.
You are most correct, Lord Khan.
translation.es: Tiene toda la razón, Señor Kan.

translation.en: The boy...
has a clever mind and... excellent perception.
translation.es: tiene una mente ágily una percepción excelente.

translation.en: He is my son...
and most dear to me.
But if it pleases Your Greatness, you may take him as your man and servant.
translation.es: Pero si así lo desea Su Alteza,puede tomarlo como sirviente.

translation.en: What do you wish in return?
The opportunity to pay tribute to my Khan from my journeys...
translation.es: La oportunidad de pagar tributoa mi Kan por mis viajes

translation.en: along the Silk Road.
translation.es: por la Ruta de la Seda.

translation.en: Father, what are you doing?
Marco, trust this. Be silent.
-I am your son. -[whispering] Be silent.
You wish not the honor of service in the court of the Khan of Khans?
translation.es: ¿No deseas el honor de serviren la corte del Kan de Kanes?

translation.en: What greater tribute can a man offer than his own flesh and his own blood?
translation.es: ¿Qué mayor tributo puede ofrecerun hombre que la sangre de su sangre?

translation.en: You Latin merchants may engage in trade along my Silk Road.
translation.es: Mercaderes latinos,pueden comerciar por mi Ruta de la Seda.

translation.en: Ahmad, my Minister of Finance,
will discuss taxation and transit.
translation.es: decidirá sobre los impuestosy el tránsito.

translation.en: Take your leave.
-Marco, you have to trust me. -Father!
-This will not be forever. -Don't do this.
translation.es: -Esto no será para siempre.-No hagas esto.

translation.en: We will secure the trade routes and be back for you.
translation.es: Aseguraremos las rutas de comercioy volveremos por ti.

translation.en: And I still want those priests.
translation.es: Y aún me deben esos sacerdotes.

translation.en: Father! Don't leave me here.
[speaking English] Of all the things I expected to come home to after all these years...
translation.es: De todas las cosasque esperaba encontrar tras tantos años...

translation.en: "Marco." She gave you a fine name.
When did she pass?
I was six.
From Jerusalem.
It has guarded my heart for 14 years.
translation.es: Ha cuidado mi corazón por 14 años.

translation.en: Psalms 72:11.
"All kings shall fall before him."
-Where were you? -The Silk Road.
translation.es: -¿Dónde estabas?-En la Ruta de la Seda.

translation.en: It ends here in Venezia.
It stretches 4,000 miles across the world.
translation.es: Se extiende 6.500 kilómetrospor todo el mundo.

translation.en: Why did you never send word to Mother?
translation.es: ¿Por qué nunca le enviastenoticias a mi madre?

translation.en: It is not simple.
We had an arrangement.
But had I any idea of the birth of a son...
translation.es: Pero si hubiera sabidodel nacimiento de un hijo...

translation.en: You have her eyes.
Well, now...
your Uncle Maffeo and I...
we have important business to discuss with the Bishop
translation.es: tenemos asuntos importantesque conversar con el Obispo

translation.en: before we set sail again.
[Marco] I will travel with you.
Father. Do not leave me alone again.
translation.es: Padre. No vuelvas a dejarme solo.

translation.en: This is not possible.
You are not prepared for the rigors of the journey ahead.
translation.es: No estás preparadopara los rigores de este viaje.

translation.en: -[wind howling] -[priest] Lord, help us!
Get over there!
I can help!
You defied me, boy!
You do not belong here! Stay away from me!
[man speaking English] No, no, no.
[speaking English] Very good.
[priest] This is not what we imagined. We must return to our flock.
translation.es: Esto no es lo que imaginamos.Debemos regresar con nuestros fieles.

translation.en: You are not abandoning our factor.
translation.es: No pueden abandonar a nuestro agente.

translation.en: Your Bishop gave you orders.
Then follow us back to Venice...
and bring the Bishop instead.
translation.es: y traigan al Obispo en nuestro lugar.

translation.en: Uncle, Uncle, these are men of God.
translation.es: Tío, ellos son hombres de Dios.

translation.en: -Godspeed. -Thank you. Thank you.
Enough!
You have no knowledge of our world! Do not act as if you do!
translation.es: ¡No sabes nada de nuestro mundo!¡No actúes como si lo supieras!

translation.en: Take your donkey.
Follow the priests back to the ship.
translation.es: Sigue a los sacerdotes hasta el barco.

translation.en: Go home.
[Niccolò] Marco!
[Maffeo] We have lost three days.
[Niccolò] We haven't lost a thing, Maffeo.
The Khan and our trade routes slip away
translation.es: Se nos escapan el Kany las rutas comerciales,

translation.en: while you make amends for your fatherly sins.
He is our blood.
Mark my words.
He will gut the foundation of everything we have labored to build.
translation.es: Él destruirá los cimientosde todo lo que hemos construido.

translation.en: -Get out. -What?
Get out.
Run!
-[Maffeo] Take cover! -Everyone, run!
Run! Go!
Go! Run!
[Maffeo] Take cover!
[Niccolò] Move! Move! Move!
Were you frightened earlier?
I was not.
I was terrified the first time I left home.
translation.es: Yo estaba aterradola primera vez que me fui de casa.

translation.en: Venezia was all I had ever known.
translation.es: Venecia era lo único que conocía.

translation.en: Do you know how I persevered?
Knowing just where home was...
and that I could always return to it.
translation.es: y que siempre podía regresar a él.

translation.en: Do you see those stars there?
The Three Sisters.
The Three Sisters.
If you are ever afraid...
if ever you doubt your place in the world...
translation.es: si alguna vez dudasde tu lugar en el mundo,

translation.en: follow The Three Sisters and they will lead you home.
translation.es: sigue las Tres Marías.Ellas te guiarán a casa.

translation.en: My only fear...
is that I might awaken in my bed...
destined to live a common life once again.
translation.es: y saberme destinadoa vivir una vida común otra vez.

translation.en: The blood of an adventurer courses through your veins.
translation.es: Por tus venas corresangre de aventurero.

translation.en: I can see this.
You will enjoy the greatest adventure of all.
translation.es: Experimentarás la mayor aventura de todas.

translation.en: You will meet...
the richest...
most powerful king on the face of this earth.
translation.es: y poderoso de la faz de la tierra.

translation.en: The Great Kublai Khan.
[Kublai] The Song rebels of Xiangyang...
can no longer cast aside our dominion with impunity.
translation.es: ya no pueden ignorarcon impunidad nuestro dominio.

translation.en: As my trusted advisors, I seek your counsel.
translation.es: Como mis consejeros de confianza,deseo conocer su opinión.

translation.en: You will one day sit here where I do now.
translation.es: Algún día te sentarás aquídonde me siento yo.

translation.en: Speak to your uncles and cousins who have traveled far.
translation.es: Habla con tus tíos y primosque han viajado lejos.

translation.en: Destroying the Song dynasty rebels is wise.
translation.es: Es prudente destruir a los rebeldesde la dinastía Song.

translation.en: But is it not wiser to let them remain in their Walled City...
translation.es: Pero ¿no es más prudentedejarlos en su ciudad amurallada...

translation.en: paying us tribute?
What does my vice regent, Yusuf, say on this matter?
Prince Jingim is correct.
North China already adores Lord Kublai.
translation.es: El norte de Chinaya adora al Señor Kublai.

translation.en: Let South China remain within their Walled City.
translation.es: Que el sur de China permanezcadentro de su ciudad amurallada.

translation.en: Treat the rebels as a...
cow that we draw milk from...
translation.es: como a una vaca de ordeñe.

translation.en: rather than slaughtering the cow, and receiving no milk.
translation.es: Si sacrificamos a la vaca,no recibiremos leche.

translation.en: [Ahmad] Or silk...
in this case.
The Walled City of Xiangyang... guards the Yangtze River.
translation.es: La ciudad amurallada de Xiangyangcontrola el río Yangtsé.

translation.en: And the Yangtze is the gateway to all China.
translation.es: Y el Yangtsé esla puerta de acceso a toda China.

translation.en: You are the Great Khan of Khans.
translation.es: Usted es el Gran Kan de Kanes.

translation.en: You desire a unified China. It should be yours no matter the cost.
translation.es: Desea una China unificada.Debería ser suya a cualquier costo.

translation.en: The Minister of Finance speaks well.
translation.es: El Ministro de Finanzas está en lo cierto.

translation.en: But this is a matter of security and defense,
translation.es: Pero este es un temade seguridad y defensa,

translation.en: not coin and commerce.
Little brother...
Ariq the Strong.
How are things in Karakorum?
Things in the Old Capital
translation.es: Las cosas en la antigua capital

translation.en: are just as our grandfather, Genghis, would have them.
translation.es: están como lo habría queridonuestro abuelo, Gengis.

translation.en: [Ariq] But there are some in Karakorum who fear
translation.es: Pero en Karakórum, hay quienes temen

translation.en: that our Khan is becoming too Chinese... too cultured in his ways.
translation.es: que nuestro Kan se esté volviendodemasiado chino, demasiado educado.

translation.en: [Kaidu] Lord Khan...
may your western cousins from the House of Ögödei speak?
translation.es: ¿pueden hablar sus primos occidentalesde la Casa de Ogodei?

translation.en: Does the Great Khan desire to be Emperor of Mongolia...
translation.es: ¿Es el deseo del Gran Kan seremperador de Mongolia

translation.en: or Emperor of China?
Cousin Kaidu...
you forget the mandate Grandfather was handed from heaven.
translation.es: olvidas el mandato divinoque recibió el abuelo.

translation.en: To erase dividing lines from country to country.
A mandate to spread our customs...
translation.es: El mandato de llevar nuestras costumbres,

translation.en: our cultures... our very way of life...
to every corner beneath the Blue Sky.
translation.es: a cada rincón bajo el Cielo Azul.

translation.en: Only one thing stood in his way, as it now stands in mine.
translation.es: Solo una cosa se interpuso en su camino,como ahora lo hace en el mío.

translation.en: Xiangyang... the Walled City.
I have already sent troops into South China.
translation.es: Ya he enviado tropas al sur de China.

translation.en: They are amassing at this very moment.
My spies tell me that in order to starve the rebels out...
translation.es: Mis espías me dicen que, a fin de someterpor hambre a los rebeldes,

translation.en: we must cut them off from the farming village of Wuchang.
translation.es: debemos cortarles el pasoen la aldea agrícola de Wuchang.

translation.en: I am sending horse soldiers to that position.
translation.es: Enviaré soldados montados a esa posición.

translation.en: Jingim...
blood of my blood, will lead the assault on Wuchang.
translation.es: sangre de mi sangre,liderará el ataque a Wuchang.

translation.en: [Kaidu] Jingim...
educated in Chinese ways.
Who better to lead an attack on the Chinese?
translation.es: ¿Quién mejor para liderarun ataque a los chinos?

translation.en: [Ariq] Older brother...
if this is a call to war... you will have my horse and bow.
translation.es: si este es un llamado a guerra,tendrás mi caballo y mi arco.

translation.en: I will lead our Golden Horde down from the north...
translation.es: Descenderé del norteal mando de nuestra Horda Dorada

translation.en: and into battle with my nephew.
translation.es: y combatiré junto a mi sobrino.

translation.en: We will crush Wuchang, then take the Walled City.
translation.es: Aplastaremos Wuchangy luego tomaremos la ciudad amurallada.

translation.en: And by the blood of Genghis...
translation.es: Y por la sangre de Gengis,

translation.en: I will cut their leader's head off and tie it to the mane of my horse!
translation.es: ¡decapitaré al líder y amarrarésu cabeza a la crin de mi caballo!

translation.en: Emperor of China?
Emperor of Mongolia?
I will be Emperor of the World!
[Jia Sidao] Empress Dowager.
Rise.
How may the Chancellor ease your pain?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puede aliviar su dolor el Canciller?

translation.en: Tell me the barbarians are no longer marching toward us.
translation.es: Dime que los bárbaros ya no marchanhacia nosotros.

translation.en: [Jia Sidao] I will not lie. The Khan's troops advance.
translation.es: No mentiré. Las tropas del Kan avanzan.

translation.en: But upon the soul of our Emperor...
translation.es: Pero por el alma de nuestro Emperador,

translation.en: I promise, they will never succeed.
Long live Song empire.
My mantis is great. Do you see?
He feigns inferiority to encourage his opponent's advance.
translation.es: Finge inferioridadpara alentar el avance de su oponente.

translation.en: [Jia Sidao] I paid a visit to the Emperor's bedside.
translation.es: Visité al Emperador en su lecho.

translation.en: [Red Brow] How is he?
Quite unwell.
[Red Brow] His legacy will live on within these walls.
translation.es: Su legado perdurarádentro de esta muralla.

translation.en: It will be a sad day... but much more efficient once he's gone.
translation.es: Cuando haya fallecido, será un día triste,pero mucho más eficiente.

translation.en: No more mixed messages from an old king to his people.
translation.es: No más mensajes confusosde un rey viejo a su pueblo.

translation.en: I will give all orders and all orders will be followed.
translation.es: Yo daré todas las órdenes,y todas se cumplirán.

translation.en: Yes, my Chancellor.
And that goes for the Emperor's favorite royal concubine.
translation.es: Y eso se aplica a la concubina realpreferida del Emperador.

translation.en: Where is your sister?
Doing that for which she is famous.
Improving diplomatic ties with the Governor of Suzhou.
translation.es: Mejora los lazos diplomáticoscon el Gobernador de Suzhóu.

translation.en: Do you know this game?
[Mei Lin] How much did you pay my brother for this opportunity?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo le pagó a mi hermanopor esta oportunidad?

translation.en: More porcelain than he's ever seen.
translation.es: Más porcelana de la que jamás haya visto.

translation.en: Do not fear, Governor.
This is part of the game you paid for.
translation.es: Esto es parte del juego que pagó.

translation.en: -The Danger Game. -[whimpers]
You...
are but a lowly... worm.
[guard] Come.
[Hundred Eyes] You have questions.
[Marco] Just one.
Am I a privileged guest or a prisoner in this hell?
translation.es: ¿Soy huésped privilegiadoo prisionero en este infierno?

translation.en: A fiery one.
No wonder the Khan caged you for his own personal amusement.
translation.es: Con razón el Kan te enjaulópara su divertimento personal.

translation.en: You're blind.
Not as blind as you, boy.
No roots.
You have spirit, Latin.
Of the Yin and the Yang, you have an abundance of Yang.
translation.es: Del yin y el yang,tienes una abundancia de yang.

translation.en: But without Yin, Yang dies on the battlefield.
translation.es: Pero sin yin,el yang muere en el campo de batalla.

translation.en: We are all prisoners here.
Prisoners and privileged guests. One and the same.
translation.es: Prisioneros y huéspedes privilegiados.Es lo mismo.

translation.en: If you are unable to protect yourself in the kingdom...
translation.es: Si eres incapaz de protegerte en el reino,

translation.en: it is I... who will be killed.
translation.es: es a mí a quien matarán.

translation.en: Do you understand?
Good. We begin with roots.
[Hundred Eyes] You have been conscripted into the court of Kublai Khan.
translation.es: Te han reclutadoen la corte de Kublai Kan.

translation.en: For what? I do not know.
-I am Hundred Eyes. -[grunting]
I am kept here to train the Khan's sons... his nobles...
translation.es: Me tienen aquí para entrenara los hijos del Kan, a sus nobles

translation.en: his pets.
You shall be tutored in the Mongolian ways of the horse.
translation.es: Aprenderás a cabalgar al estilo mongol.

translation.en: You shall be tutored in the great arts of the East...
translation.es: Aprenderás sobre las grandes artesde Oriente

translation.en: by those scholars and artisans loyal to Lord Kublai.
translation.es: de mano de eruditosy artesanos leales al Señor Kublai.

translation.en: Languages and letters.
Hawking and archery.
And in the end... you may discover the answer to your question.
translation.es: Y al final, tal vez descubrasla respuesta a tu pregunta.

translation.en: [Kublai] A man found in possession of a stolen horse...
translation.es: Si se descubre a un hombrecon un caballo robado,

translation.en: must return it to its owner, add nine horses of the same kind.
translation.es: este debe devolverlo a su dueño,más nueve caballos similares.

translation.en: If he is unable to pay this fine...
translation.es: Si no puede pagar la multa,

translation.en: his children must be taken instead of the horses.
translation.es: debe entregar a sus hijosen lugar de los caballos.

translation.en: If he has no children...
then he must be slaughtered like a sheep.
translation.es: entonces es sacrificado como una oveja.

translation.en: That man has no children.
I hear from my Minister of Falconry, you have taken well to the hawks.
translation.es: Según mi Ministro de Cetrería,te agradan los halcones.

translation.en: Archery is improving, yes?
Yes, Great Khan.
I, myself, was always a bit clumsy with the making of Chinese characters.
translation.es: Yo siempre fui algo torpepara trazar los caracteres chinos.

translation.en: When you and your father crossed Central Asia...
translation.es: Cuando tu padre y tú cruzaronAsia central,

translation.en: you passed through Badakhshān.
Describe for me, in the way that you do...
how you made the passage, what you saw.
translation.es: cómo hicieron el pasaje, qué vieron.

translation.en: We saw sand.
Rode beasts.
Do you defy me?
Describe for me the land of Badakhshān.
The footing was hard on our beasts.
translation.es: El suelo era difícilpara nuestras bestias.

translation.en: The sun very hot.
Take him to the horse grounds. Stuff his mouth with the shit of pigs.
translation.es: Llévenlo a los establos.Llénenle la boca con mierda de cerdo.

translation.en: You enter a gate made of rock...
translation.es: Se ingresa por un portal de piedra,

translation.en: east of Bukhara...
and begin to ascend into the Pamir Mountains.
translation.es: y se comienza a ascendera la cordillera del Pamir.

translation.en: There are great numbers of all kind of wild beasts.
translation.es: Hay gran cantidadde todo tipo de bestias salvajes.

translation.en: And the men of Badakhshān...
speak of a breed of horse which is said to be the direct offspring of Alexander's.
translation.es: hablan de una raza de caballo que esdescendiente directo del de Alejandro.

translation.en: Odd bit of trivia.
I've always been taken by the audacity of Alexander.
translation.es: Siempre me intrigóla audacia de Alejandro.

translation.en: A great conqueror.
There are 20 cities that bear his name, huh?
I now possess them all.
Do you blame me for your current station in life?
No, Sire.
I simply wonder why you kept me.
translation.es: Simplemente me pregunto para qué le sirvo.

translation.en: I need no reason, Latin.
As my servant...
you will accompany a tax collector as he makes his rounds.
translation.es: acompañarás a un recaudador de impuestosen sus rondas.

translation.en: This will give you a view of my Imperial City and my subjects.
translation.es: Esto te dará una ideade mi ciudad imperial y mis súbditos.

translation.en: You will report back to me, describe what you have seen...
translation.es: Te presentarás ante míy me informarás lo que viste,

translation.en: as you saw it.
I'm giving you freedom.
But the walls of my kingdom stretch beyond the horizon.
translation.es: Pero mi reino se extiendemás allá del horizonte.

translation.en: Do you understand?
Yes, Sire.
I give you leave.
I assumed you would be riding to Wuchang by now.
translation.es: Supuse que ya estarías cabalgandohacia Wuchang.

translation.en: The astrologers told you this morning was the most auspicious hour to march.
translation.es: Los astrólogos te dijeron que la mañanaera la hora más auspiciosa para marchar.

translation.en: The Confucian advisors said it is better we ride at night.
translation.es: Los asesores confucianos dijeronque era mejor cabalgar de noche.

translation.en: They also believe a war can be won without fighting.
translation.es: También creenque las guerras pueden ganarse sin luchar.

translation.en: Why must they always speak in riddles?
-"The supreme art of war," Father. -Mmm.
translation.es: "El supremo arte de la guerra", padre.

translation.en: Still...
tomorrow I ride to Wuchang as a Mongol...
translation.es: mañana parto a Wuchang como mongol

translation.en: and I carry my father's flag.
translation.es: y porto la bandera de mi padre.

translation.en: You are your mother's son, Jingim.
translation.es: Eres digno hijo de tu madre, Jingim.

translation.en: Educated... patient... noble.
There will be a time for all these things in the new dynasty.
translation.es: Habrá tiempo para todas estas cosasen la nueva dinastía.

translation.en: I must prepare to ride.
My three wives each desire a visit before I go to battle.
translation.es: Cada una de mis tres esposas desea quela visite antes de partir a la batalla.

translation.en: You're also your father's son.
translation.es: También eres digno hijo de tu padre.

translation.en: Give to me the nectar... so I keep it when you go...
translation.es: Entrégame el néctar,para así conservarlo en tu ausencia

translation.en: and give you a son.
-And what if it's a daughter? -[chuckles]
Yang the Healer says to do it like this, in the Golden Lotus,
translation.es: El sanador Yang dice que lo hagamos así,en el Loto Dorado,

translation.en: and I shall finally bear you an heir.
Yang the Healer will be promoted to the ministry.
translation.es: El sanador Yang será ascendidoal ministerio.

translation.en: Tell me...
does your Chinese wife do it like this? Huh?
[woman] Nice. They're so beautiful. You can let it go.
translation.es: Bien. Cuánta belleza. Puedes dejarlo ir.

translation.en: Are you ready?
Here we go.
the Venetian.
A pleasure to formally make your acquaintance.
She is my charge, so avert your gaze.
translation.es: Ella está bajo mi custodia,así que aparta la mirada.

translation.en: She is far past the reach of a foreign merchant's son.
translation.es: Jamás podría tenerlael hijo de un mercader extranjero.

translation.en: I followed the wrong path.
-Indeed you did... -[bell tolls]
and the clock tower just struck first bell.
translation.es: y el reloj de la torre ya diola primera campanada.

translation.en: My apologies to you.
The Governor said the songs they sing about you south of Quinsai are true.
translation.es: El Gobernador afirma que son ciertaslas canciones sobre ti al sur de Quinsai.

translation.en: You pleased him greatly.
[Mei Lin] The Emperor's dying.
You must honor his wishes.
Anything he wants.
Make a truce with the barbarians.
translation.es: Haz una tregua con los bárbaros.

translation.en: That was not what the Emperor desired when he was well and strong.
translation.es: Eso no era lo que deseaba el Emperadorcuando estaba sano y fuerte.

translation.en: Truce is the dying cry of the weak and the sick.
translation.es: "Tregua" es la súplica agónicade los débiles y los enfermos.

translation.en: [Mei Lin] Kublai is too strong.
I worry for my daughter if the barbarians take our city.
translation.es: Me preocupo por mi hijasi los bárbaros toman la ciudad.

translation.en: Let your Chancellor manage military affairs.
translation.es: Deja que tu Canciller se encarguede los asuntos militares.

translation.en: You manage the imperial bed chamber.
Let the Chancellor not forget who it was who won him favor in this court.
translation.es: Que el Canciller no olvidequién lo congració ante esta corte.

translation.en: When the strike of the praying mantis breaks the body of the cricket,
translation.es: Cuando el golpe de la mantis religiosaquiebra el cuerpo del grillo,

translation.en: it is because of its timing.
translation.es: se debe a su sentido de la oportunidad.

translation.en: Timing, Mei Lin.
translation.es: Sentido de la oportunidad, Mei Lin.

translation.en: Trust me, like my soldiers do.
translation.es: Confía en mí, como confían mis soldados.

translation.en: And worry no more.
When the Emperor is gone, you will still be esteemed in this court.
translation.es: Cuando el Emperador ya no esté,aún se te estimará en esta corte.

translation.en: [Hundred Eyes] Get up.
Get up.
I did not ask to train you, Latin.
There is no honor in this for me.
translation.es: Esto no significa ningún honor para mí.

translation.en: Nor did you ask to be left here by a man
translation.es: Y tú no pedisteser abandonado aquí por un hombre

translation.en: who would trade his own son like 2 pounds of spice...
translation.es: dispuesto a entregar a su propio hijo,como si fuera un kilo de especias,

translation.en: for the opportunity to open trade routes to the West.
translation.es: a cambio de abrirrutas comerciales a Occidente.

translation.en: Go ahead, take it.
Let him go, Latin.
Let him go.
Get up.
If you wish to survive here, get up at once.
translation.es: Si deseas sobrevivir aquí,levántate de inmediato.

translation.en: The foreigner has been summoned.
It is quiet.
As it is before a typhoon.
translation.es: Como siempre antes de un tifón.

translation.en: By the Eternal Blue Sky, let us sing from our throats
translation.es: Por el Eterno Cielo Azul,cantemos a viva voz

translation.en: and let them hear the devil that they are about to meet.
translation.es: para que oigan al diabloque están a punto de enfrentar.

translation.en: The sons of my father's concubines always speak the loudest.
translation.es: Los hijos de las concubinas de mi padresiempre hablan más fuerte.

translation.en: We must attack as Genghis would.
translation.es: Debemos atacar como lo haría Gengis.

translation.en: Ariq... he is not there.
What do you mean "he is not there"?
[panting] No Ariq.
No Golden Horde.
Just grass and sky.
[Nima] Ah, yes.
Welcome.
Proceed down the hall.
And Master Marco... I will be watching you.
[Kublai] Enter.
Sire.
Your new quarters are more spacious than the last, no?
translation.es: Tus nuevos aposentos sonmás espaciosos que los últimos, ¿no?

translation.en: Yes, very much. Thank you.
[Kublai] I have a test for you.
You will walk back down the Hall of Five Desires.
translation.es: Regresa al Salón de los Cinco Deseos.

translation.en: These girls are from Kungurat...
highly skilled in the arts of love.
A man who proves his loyalty to me can take whatever he wishes.
translation.es: El hombre que me demuestra su lealtadpuede tomar lo que desee.

translation.en: -You may not. -[women moaning]
Not yet.
Look... but do not touch.
[Chabi] The walls have eyes, Marco Polo.
translation.es: Los muros tienen ojos, Marco Polo.

translation.en: Do you hear them taunt us?
They mock our blood.
Even without Ariq's army, we should still attack like Mongols...
translation.es: Aun sin el ejército de Ariq,deberíamos atacar como mongoles...

translation.en: or retreat as cowards.
[Jingim] That is no farming village.
translation.es: Esa no es una aldea agrícola.

translation.en: How many men did you say we have?
Five hundred?
And down there?
[Byamba] More. Many more.
[Aruka] As your General...
I advise... retreat.
We do not return home until we conquer that village.
Give the command.
